title: It's unlikely Kylie Jenner and Travis Scott will get back together, apparently
text:
From Cosmopolitan

Travis Scott and Kylie Jenner confirmed their split to the world earlier this month, and it doesn't sound like a reunion could be on the cards any time soon.

Instead, the pair are focussing on co-parenting their daughter Stormi Webster, who turns two in February.

While many fans thought Kylie Jenner and Travis Scott went together like lips and filler, a new report suggests a reunion between the pair isn't very likely.

The Keeping Up With The Kardashians couple announced their split earlier this month, after rumours broke that the had gone their separate ways. Kylie took to Twitter to confirm the news, telling her fans, "Travis and I are on great terms and our main focus right now is Stormi! Our friendship and our daughter is priority."

Photo credit: Rich Fury - Getty Images More

And while they've been spotted together since, Us Weekly’s sources say there’s basically no chance of them reuniting anytime soon. "Kylie and Travis are still not back together," a source commented. "It doesn’t look like they will immediately reconcile anymore. They have differing objectives and two different lives."

Inteeeresting. Any ideas what those differing objectives are, anyone? This comes as a source at the publication previously revealed "Kylie is doing fine since her breakup with Travis", and the pair are "extremely close" for the benefit of their daughter, Stormi.

A second source continued, "They love each other and they share a daughter that will bind them together for life. They’ve been great partners in that respect. They are both putting aside any romantic differences to be the best parents in the world for their daughter."

Are Kylie and Travis over for good, then? Say it ain't so.
